name: Ocean's Call
description:
The ocean calls… Will you answer?

There are secrets to be found beneath the water’s glassy surface if you know where to look. But perhaps some things are best left hidden.

Originally published in sub-Q Magazine, 2018. For more great short interactive fiction, check out their site here: https://sub-q.com/

Special thanks to Oliver “Bugreporter” Stevenson-Hoare for beta testing this game, and Malebranche for developing the CS Fade & Color Mod.
